Text.Page:
Our scouts reported a new type of argon near the {@Rgn:49002}. They said the creatures ate iteris shards, if you can believe that.

Head out there, kill some suulvir raptors, and bring any shards you find. We must learn if the argons can change the shards on their own.

Intriguing. I can feel the difference, but I can't explain it. Bah. I'll leave that to our Mysterium friends.

They're not using them against us and for now, that'll suffice. Fine work.
The iteris shards are vital to the war effortâ€”ours and theirs. Kill some raptors and bring me at least three shards for comparison.
